message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $18000. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a competitive price.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14000.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. My new offer is $16000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great price for this unique product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $15000.

I'm still not willing to sell the product for $15000, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $16500. This is the best price I can do, and I think it's a fair compromise considering the product's value and your initial offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering the product's value and our previous negotiations, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16000.

I'm not willing to sell the product for $16000, but I'm willing to meet you at $16500 was too high, I will go slightly lower than that. My new offer is $16250. This is the best price I can do, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and our previous negotiations.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering our previous discussions and the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16000.

I've been flexible with the price, but I'm not willing to go back to $16000. I'm willing to make one final offer at $16750. This is the absolute lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and our previous negotiations.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $16500.
